remarks:
Utility lemma for two-parameter classes. _EDITORIAL_: can simplify ~ isghm , ~ islmhm .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.) 

---

 Utility lemma for two-parameter classes.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
statement:
elovmpt2.d $e |- D = ( a e. A , b e. B |-> C ) $.
elovmpt2.c $e |- C e. _V $.
elovmpt2.e $e |- ( ( a = X /\ b = Y ) -> C = E ) $.
elovmpt2 $p |- ( F e. ( X D Y ) <-> ( X e. A /\ Y e. B /\ F e. E ) ) $.
$d A a b $.
$d B a b $.
$d E a b $.
$d F a b $.
$d X a b $.
$d Y a b $.
